item.title: Divorce can be less painful
item.description:
Divorce can be less painful

The dissolution of your marriage is an emotional and stressful event. The compassionate attorneys at Ascher & Denton, PLLC help ease the legal strain of divorce so you can concentrate on the health and well-being of your family.

item.title: Minimize Pain & Expense
item.description:
Minimize Pain & Expense

Since 1990, Ascher & Denton lawyers have been achieving the best family outcomes with minimal conflict and expense.

item.title: We only do family law
item.description:
We only do family law

Many attorneys run screaming rather than practicing in this area of law because it takes a special kind of personality (not common among those who become lawyers) to communicate compassionately with very upset people. Not only is it vital for us to understand and help emotionally distressed people, but we have to keep a professional distance from their problems so we can be a smart outsider who does not...

item.title: Family law done right
item.description:
Family law done right

Welcome to the Ascher & Denton web site. Thanks for visiting. We truly enjoy our work. Let us know how we can help you. Since 1990, Ascher & Denton has been providing top quality legal services to families in Thurston County. We focus on helping people through the legal process at the least cost, emotionally and financially.

item.title: ~Our Team~
item.description:
~Our Team~

Kaylene, Melissa and Khrys have your back in your Family Law case

item.title: Our Philosophy
item.description:
Our Philosophy

Ascher & Denton, PLLC was created with some very clear goals in mind. We feel it is vitally important to assist our clients through controversies involving the legal system at the least cost to the client, financially and emotionally. Treating each other and others with respect is paramount. Compassion is important, as is clear thinking and honesty. We believe that inflicting unneeded costs (or pain) on others is a big mistake.

item.title: One Lawyer
item.description:
One Lawyer

The complicated divorce or child custody is less so with one lawyer.
